content: Yes, that's certainly true. People's beliefs and values can evolve and change as they grow and learn throughout their lives. Often, what seemed important or significant when we were younger may become less so as we gain new experiences and insights. It's a natural part of personal growth and development to reassess our beliefs and values from time to time, and to make changes when necessary. It is important to be open to new ideas and perspectives, as this can help us to grow and evolve into better versions of ourselves.
